Brand: Chloe + Chad

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Hibiscus sabdariffa (hibiscus) hydrosol water*, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Hamamelis virginiana (witch hazel) hydrosol water*, Apple cider vinegar

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Hibiscus sabdariffa (hibiscus) hydrosol water*, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Hamamelis virginiana (witch hazel) hydrosol water*, Apple cider vinegar

Directions: Apply a small amount on a cotton swab and apply over face. Follow up with Chloe + Chad Face Serum for best results.
